FuncDef: The display qos resource sub-port-queue command displays the usage of sub-interface queues.
CLIs: display qos resource sub-port-queue slot <slot-id> { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a network header length for a service profile in the inbound direction.
-

Specifies a network header length for a service profile in the outbound direction.
-

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 16 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display qos resource sub-port-queue slot 1 outbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the usage of sub-interface queues, run the display qos resource sub-port-queue command.
